description.value:
Granted Powers: Your touch staves off pain and death, and your healing magic is particularly vital and potent.

Domain Spells: 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.xoc3vhg3btmfjauq]{Cure Light Wounds}, 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.e67esdjp4nojtbr7]{Cure Moderate Wounds}, 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.norn02g8zdsspf2j]{Cure Serious Wounds} 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.sa076xymi52eq3to]{Cure Critical Wounds}, 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.qiiis9ekgy3syu7j]{Breath Of Life}, 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.4re1j2w8wkvsvnsi]{Heal}, 7th—regenerate, 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.6346rs0f4sra9gt4]{Cure Critical Wounds, Mass}, 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.klcvk9ct1l7mhjwp]{Heal, Mass}.
